p: The synthesis of OBCFAs in the mammary glands might also be affected by high levels of UFA in the diet of dairy cows, which could explain the lower proportion of these fatty acids in the milk of cows fed sunflower oil [ 33]. In a previous work, researchers supplemented grazing dairy cows with canola oil, sunflower oil, and linseed oil (0.5 kg/day) and also observed a decrease in OBCFAs in the milk [ 34].
